scripts.start: browserify src/main.ts -p tsify --debug -o dist/icecast.debug.js && watchify src/main.ts -p tsify --debug  -o dist/icecast.debug.js -v
scripts.release: browserify src/main.ts -p tsify --debug -o dist/icecast.$npm_package_version.js && browserify src/main.ts -p tsify -p [ minifyify --no-map ] -o dist/icecast.$npm_package_version.min.js
scripts.test: mocha-phantomjs -k node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-istanbul TestRunner.html && remap-istanbul --input coverage/coverage.json --output coverage/html --exclude node_modules --type html && remap-istanbul --input coverage/coverage.json --output coverage/coverage.json --exclude node_modules --type json
